title: Ticket #7285: DAGMan should recognize sets of nodes
description:
Miron wants me to think about how to define a "set" of nodes within DAGMan.

For now, this ticket is primarily a stub for a design document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1tOpTSyBi69ABcyTPTyYwWXS9ebsU4TOKNFbW7BnMGZw/edit?usp=sharing

All design decisions should go into that doc. If/when the time comes to write code for this, we'll assign it to this ticket and track progress here.
